channel.title: 317. my friend can't load the run.bat + need help with testing my server,
channel.description:
1. my friend can't load the run bat 2. ive tested a lot of run.bats like all the ones i knew. it keeps on running for me but he gets the failure run so i'm wondering if it could be because he has jre6 and i have jre7 and 6
and well about the help with the server, i would like someone to help me with it 'more like help testing, telling me where the bugs are and run it with me when i get it settup for players.
anyway thanks for the attension
yurak owner of heroiccape

item.title: 317. my friend can't load the run.bat + need help with testing my server,
item.dc:creator: @aciraccar aciraccar
item.description:
@aciraccar wrote:

32Bit= “C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe”
64 bit= “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe”
im not sure about the 64bit one

Read full topic

item.title: 317. my friend can't load the run.bat + need help with testing my server,
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

Uhm, I’d recommend you using JDK. Also, make sure you know which programs files its in. If it’s in program (x86) than change the run.bat program to (x86) if it’s in program files Not x86 than its program files. Depends what error you get, copy and paste here.

Read full topic
